#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<utility>
#include<map>
#include<string.h>
#include<bitset>
#include<stack>
#include<queue>
#include<set>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cmath>
#include<ctime>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
#include<cctype>
#include<climits>
#define mn(a,b) a>b?b:a
#define loop(n,i) for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
#define mx(a,b) a>b?a:b
#define PI 3.14159
#define put printf
#define get scanf
#define all(a) a.begin(),a.end()
#define iter vector<int>::iterator
#define szf sizeof
#define setfiles freopen("in.txt","r",stdin);freopen("out.txt","w",stdout);
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define tr(c,i) for(typeof((c).begin())i=(c).begin();i!=(c).end();i++)
template <class type>type fact(type n){return n==1?1:fact(n-1)*n;}
template <class type>type gcd(type a,type b){return b==0?a:gcd(b,a%b);}
typedef long long int ll;
typedef unsigned long long int ull;
using namespace std;
typedef vector<int> VI;
typedef pair<int,int> PII;
typedef vector<VI> VVI;
typedef vector<vector<PII> > VVP;
#define MY 2147483647
void swap(int &i,int &j){
	int tmp=i;
	i=j;j=tmp;
}
int main(){
	int t,r,c;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		cin>>r>>c;
		int arr[r+1][c+1];
		loop(r+1,i)arr[i][c]=MY;
		loop(c+1,i)arr[r][i]=MY;
		loop(r,i)loop(c,j)cin>>arr[i][j];
		arr[0][0]=MY;
		int cnt=0,i=0,j=0;
		while(!(arr[i+1][j]==MY&&arr[i][j+1]==MY)){
			if(i<r-1&&j<c-1){
				if(arr[i+1][j]<arr[i][j+1]){
					swap(arr[i][j],arr[++i][j]);
					cnt++;continue;
				}
				else{
					swap(arr[i][j],arr[i][++j]);
					cnt++;continue;
				}
			}
			if(i==r-1){
				if(arr[i][j+1]!=MY){
					swap(arr[i][j],arr[i][++j]);
					cnt++;continue;
				}
			}
			if(j==c-1){
				if(arr[i+1][j]!=MY){
					swap(arr[i][j],arr[++i][j]);
					cnt++;continue;
				}
			}
		}
		cout<<cnt<<endl;
	}
}
